Key Match Events: Ivan Schranz scored Slovakia's quickest goal at a major tournament
Post-Match Reflections: Domenico Tedesco said that the missed chances were a shame but that there was no need to panic for his Belgian side
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Belgium's first loss in 16 games under coach Domenico Tedesco
Others: Slovakia joined Romania at the top of the standings after the latter's 3-0 win over Ukraine in Munich earlier on Monday
